overview:
Adeel is CEO of iLead, a digital marketing agency based in Lahore, Pakistan.

A passionate, experienced and creative leader and founder of iLead. Adeel plays a vital role in managing the strategic direction at iLead and managing the iLead team at all levels.

Adeel has worked with leading eCommerce clients in the UK for over seven years managing eCommerce strategy and online marketing campaigns. Adeel is specialised in eCommerce business development, online project management, online marketing campaigns planning and management, website analytics and optimisation and content management development.

Adeel has BSc in eCommerce from Huddersfield University, MSc eCommerce from Manchester Business School and MBA from Lancaster Business School.
